AbilityBlueprint.Name: HVampireBite01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Lord Erebus bites a target, draining [GetAmount] Health. For [GetDuration] seconds after the bite, the target's Armor is reduced by [GetArmorBuff] and Movement Speed is decreased by [GetMovementBuff]%.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HVampireConversion01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Lord Erebus has a [GetVampireChance]% chance to convert infantry into Night Walkers when they die. His Night Walkers have +[GetHealthBonus] Health.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HVampireArmyoftheNight
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Lord Erebus leads his Night Walkers as a bloodthirsty pack. Their Attack Speed is increased by [GetAttackBonus]% and their attacks drain life.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HVampireMassCharm01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Stuns enemies around Lord Erebus for [GetMistStun] seconds. Demigods are stunned for [GetHeroMistStun] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HVampireMuddle
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Mass Charm leaves lingering effects on Demigods. Any Demigod affected by Mass Charm has their cooldowns increased by [GetCooldownMult]% for [GetDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HVampireBiteGrey01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Lord Erebus bites a target, draining [GetAmount] Health. For [GetDuration] seconds after the bite, the target's Armor is reduced by [GetArmorBuff] and Movement Speed is decreased by [GetMovementBuff]%.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HVampireMistGrey01
AbilityBlueprint.Description:
Lord Erebus transforms into mist, draining [GetDamage] life per second his foes while they are in the mist and transferring it to his allies.

 While Mist is active Lord Erebus loses [GetSelfMana] Mana per second and cannot move, capture flags, be healed or use abilities.

Entering Mist removes all negative effects.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HVampireMassCharmGrey01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Stuns enemies around Lord Erebus for [GetMistStun] seconds. Demigods are stunned for [GetHeroMistStun] seconds.
